name: convert_screenshot_coordinates
title: Convert screenshot pixels to logical click coords
description: Turn coordinates measured on a screenshot into logical positions for click_screen.

arguments.name: screenshot_x
arguments.description: X coordinate measured on the screenshot

arguments.name: screenshot_y
arguments.description: Y coordinate measured on the screenshot

arguments.name: note
arguments.description: What you plan to click there

content.text: You measured a screenshot coordinate at ({{screenshot_x}}, {{screenshot_y}}) for {{note}}. Call `convert_screenshot_coordinates` and return logical_x/logical_y, scaling_factor, and warnings. Provide the exact `click_screen` call to run next, using auto_scale only if the caller prefers to keep screenshot coordinates.
